examples.example: 我今天去了一趟超市，买了很多生活用品。

translate.english: I went to the supermarket today and bought a lot of daily necessities.

examples.example: 我今天特意跑了一趟图书馆，借了几本有趣的书。

translate.english: I specially ran to the library today and borrowed several interesting books.

examples.example: 我专门跑了一趟老家，看望了许久未见的亲人。

translate.english: I specially made a trip to my hometown and visited the relatives I haven't seen for a long time.
